title: 1991 New Zealand rugby union tour of Australia
text:
The 1991 New Zealand tour rugby to Australia was the 27th tour by the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">New Zealand</a> national <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team to Australia.
It was a short tour with two matches. In the same year the <a href="Bledisloe%20Cup">Bledisloe Cup</a> was contested in a home/away format. One match was held in each country, and a preliminary match in each. 
The All Blacks lost the Sydney test match, but won the return test match later in the month, during the subsequent <a href="1991%20Australia%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20New%20Zealand">Australian tour of New Zealand</a> to retain the <a href="Bledisloe%20Cup">Bledisloe Cup</a>.
The tour.
"Scores and results list New Zealand's points tally first."
